filters.label: Volume
filters.description: Adjusts audio volume by linear factor, decibels, or expression.

parameters.name: volume
parameters.description: Volume adjustment factor. Examples: '1.5' (linear), '5dB' (decibels), or expression.

filters.agent_notes: Use for simple gain adjustment. Accepts expressions for dynamic control.

filters.label: Loudness Normalization (EBU R128)
filters.description: Loudness normalization filter based on EBU R128 standard.
filters.agent_notes: For broadcast/podcast loudness. Use 2-pass mode for precise normalization.

filters.label: Dynamic Audio Normalization
filters.description: Applies dynamic normalization for more consistent volume.
filters.agent_notes: Auto-rides gain for variable audio. Good for speech or inconsistent sources.

filters.label: FFT Denoise
filters.description: Spectral noise reduction using FFT denoising.
filters.agent_notes: Fast and good for hiss/static removal.

filters.label: Neural Network Denoise
filters.description: Deep learning noise reduction using a pre-trained model.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: Path to pre-trained RNNoise or compatible model.

filters.agent_notes: Very high quality but slower. Needs model file.

filters.label: Highpass Filter
filters.description: Removes low-frequency noise below cutoff frequency.
filters.agent_notes: Removes rumble, handling noise, plosives.

filters.label: Lowpass Filter
filters.description: Removes high-frequency noise above cutoff frequency.
filters.agent_notes: Removes hiss or digital noise above cutoff.

filters.label: Bandpass Filter
filters.description: Allows only frequencies within a specific range to pass.
filters.agent_notes: Combine with highpass/lowpass for advanced cleanup.

filters.label: Equalizer (Single Band)
filters.description: Single-band parametric equalizer. Adjust center frequency, Q, and gain.

parameters.name: w
parameters.description: Q-factor, octave width, or Hz width (depends on t).

filters.agent_notes: Best for surgical EQ on a single frequency. Chain for multi-band.

filters.label: Graphic/Parametric Equalizer (Multi-Band)
filters.description: Multi-band equalizer. Flexible bands for precise shaping.

parameters.name: bands
parameters.description: Array of band objects: {f, w, t, g}

filters.agent_notes: Advanced use; define multiple bands. See FFmpeg docs for full syntax.

filters.label: Firequalizer (Programmable EQ)
filters.description: Flexible high-quality parametric EQ. Program filter shape.
filters.agent_notes: For advanced EQ curves, filters, or mastering. Can emulate popular EQ shapes.

filters.label: Echo
filters.description: Simple echo/multi-echo effect.

parameters.name: delays
parameters.description: Delay times in ms (comma-separated for multiple echos).

filters.agent_notes: Supports multiple echoes. For more advanced effects, see chorus/flanger.

filters.label: Reverb
filters.description: Adds reverberation to simulate rooms/spaces.
filters.agent_notes: Simple reverb. For more control, consider third-party plugins.

filters.label: Chorus
filters.description: Chorus/flange modulation effect.
filters.agent_notes: Can do multiple voices; use for creative spatial or flange effects.

filters.label: Tempo Change
filters.description: Change audio speed without changing pitch.
filters.agent_notes: For speech/music. Chain for >2x or <0.5x speeds.

filters.label: Set Sample Rate
filters.description: Change the sample rate of the audio (changes both pitch and speed).
filters.agent_notes: Combined with atempo can re-pitch and resample.

filters.label: Tremolo
filters.description: Amplitude modulation effect (tremolo).
filters.agent_notes: For classic tremolo effect in guitar, synth, or vocals.

filters.label: Vibrato
filters.description: Pitch modulation effect (vibrato).
filters.agent_notes: For classic vibrato or special effects.

filters.label: Channel Delay
filters.description: Delay audio channels by specified milliseconds.

parameters.name: delays
parameters.description: Delay per channel, in ms, separated by | (e.g., 1000|2000).

filters.agent_notes: Delay L/R or surround channels separately.

filters.label: Pad Audio
filters.description: Pad the end of audio with silence.
filters.agent_notes: Pad for looping or aligning tracks.

filters.label: Flanger
filters.description: Flanger effect—comb filtering modulation.
filters.agent_notes: Flanger for classic swoosh/phaser FX.

filters.label: Pan
filters.description: Remix channels for routing, downmix, upmix (mono, stereo, surround).
filters.agent_notes: Highly flexible; use for all channel mapping needs.

filters.label: Stereo Tools
filters.description: Stereo width, balance, phase, inversion, and mono-mix.
filters.agent_notes: For stereo imaging, mono conversion, phase flip, etc.

filters.label: Channel Split
filters.description: Splits channels of multi-channel audio into separate mono streams.
filters.agent_notes: Outputs one file per channel.

filters.label: Audio Merge
filters.description: Merges multiple mono streams into a multi-channel stream.

parameters.name: inputs
parameters.description: Number of input streams to merge.

filters.agent_notes: Inputs must be single-channel (mono).

filters.label: Audio Format
filters.description: Set sample rate, sample format, or channel layout.
filters.agent_notes: For format conversion, channel matching.

filters.label: Stereo Widen
filters.description: Widen the stereo image for spatial effect.
filters.agent_notes: Use for width/spatial enhancement; can degrade mono compatibility.

filters.label: Compressor
filters.description: Standard audio compressor to reduce dynamic range.
filters.agent_notes: Reduces loud/quiet variation, helps with spoken word and music.

filters.label: Limiter
filters.description: Audio limiter to prevent peaks/clipping.
filters.agent_notes: Set slightly below 0dB to avoid digital clipping.

filters.label: Gate/Expander
filters.description: Audio gate/expander to cut low-level noise.
filters.agent_notes: Cleans up room tone, background noise.

filters.label: Dynamic Audio Normalization
filters.description: Level-riding dynamic audio normalization.
filters.agent_notes: Smooths out level fluctuations (podcasts, vlogs, etc).

filters.label: Audio Statistics
filters.description: Computes per-channel audio stats (level, RMS, peak, DC offset, etc.).

parameters.name: metadata
parameters.description: Write stats to metadata (0: no, 1: yes).

parameters.name: reset
parameters.description: Reset stats every N frames (0: never).

filters.agent_notes: Outputs to stderr or metadata, not audio/video files.

filters.label: Audio Metadata
filters.description: Extract or modify audio frame/block metadata.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Metadata key to extract or set (e.g., lavfi.astats.Overall.RMS_level).

filters.agent_notes: Used in analysis chains with astats, silencedetect, etc.

filters.label: Show Frequencies
filters.description: Visualize audio frequencies as video (bar, line, dot, etc).
filters.agent_notes: Requires video output. Great for waveform/spectrum visualizers.

filters.label: Audio Spectrum
filters.description: Displays audio spectrum as a video output (spectrogram).
filters.agent_notes: Renders a spectrogram video. Can be used for music visualization.

filters.label: Audio Stream Select
filters.description: Selects a specific audio stream from multi-stream input.
filters.agent_notes: Used for picking language or commentary tracks.

filters.label: Silence Detect
filters.description: Detects periods of silence in audio (for trimming, segmenting, etc).
filters.agent_notes: Useful for podcast/video editing automation. Outputs events, not audio.

filters.label: Audio Resample
filters.description: Change audio sample rate (resampling).
filters.agent_notes: For format conversion, up/down sampling.

filters.label: Audio Split
filters.description: Split audio into multiple identical outputs.

filters.label: Concatenate Audio
filters.description: Concatenate multiple audio inputs sequentially.
filters.agent_notes: Can also use -filter_complex with concat filter for advanced use.

filters.label: Audio Delay
filters.description: Delay audio channels by N milliseconds.

parameters.name: delays
parameters.description: Pipe-separated delay per channel in ms (e.g., 1000|2000).

filters.label: Audio Pad (Silence)
filters.description: Add silence to audio (start/end).

filters.label: Audio Trim
filters.description: Trim audio by start/end time or duration.

filters.label: Silence Remove
filters.description: Remove periods of silence automatically from audio.

parameters.name: start_periods
parameters.description: Number of silent periods at start to remove.

filters.label: Audio Format
filters.description: Set sample format, rate, or channel layout.

filters.label: Set Audio PTS
filters.description: Set audio presentation timestamp.

filters.label: Set Number of Samples
filters.description: Set the number of samples per audio frame.

parameters.name: p
parameters.description: Set 1 to pad/truncate to exactly n samples.

filters.label: Channel Map
filters.description: Remap or reorder audio channels.

filters.label: Compressor/Expander (Compand)
filters.description: Apply dynamic range compression or expansion to audio using companding curves.

parameters.name: attacks
parameters.description: Attack times (in seconds) for each segment.

parameters.name: decays
parameters.description: Decay times (in seconds) for each segment.

filters.agent_notes: For advanced dynamic range shaping. Requires tuning of points.

filters.label: Advanced Equalizer
filters.description: Flexible multi-band graphic or parametric EQ.
examples: ffmpeg -i input.wav -af "anequalizer=c0 f=100 w=100 g=5 t=1|c0 f=1000 w=200 g=-2 t=1" output.wav

parameters.name: c0
parameters.description: Band settings for channel 0 (e.g., f=100 w=100 g=5 t=1 | f=1000 w=200 g=-2 t=1).

filters.label: High Definition Compatible Digital (HDCD) Decoder
filters.description: Decode HDCD-encoded audio.
filters.agent_notes: No parameters. Use for remastering or archival audio.

filters.label: Rubber Band (Time/Pitch Shift)
filters.description: Time-stretch or pitch-shift audio (requires lib rubberband).
filters.agent_notes: Requires ffmpeg compiled with rubberband support.

filters.label: Sofalizer (Binaural Render)
filters.description: Virtual surround/binaural effect using SOFA data for headphones.

parameters.name: sofa
parameters.description: Path to SOFA file (spatial acoustic data).

filters.agent_notes: For advanced binaural headphone processing.

filters.label: Audio Channel Extract
filters.description: Extract a single channel from multichannel audio.

parameters.name: channels
parameters.description: Channel(s) to extract (e.g., FL, FR, C).

filters.label: Audio FIR Convolution
filters.description: Apply convolution using an impulse response file (reverb, tone shaping).
filters.agent_notes: Use impulse responses for reverb, amp simulation, etc.

filters.label: BS2B
filters.description: Bauer stereophonic-to-binaural audio transform for headphones.
filters.agent_notes: Best used for stereo->headphone mastering.

filters.label: LADSPA Plugin
filters.description: Run an external LADSPA plugin.
filters.agent_notes: System must have LADSPA plugins installed.
